name: Bazillus Maximus
description:
Bazillus Maximus is a short and simple game about proving to your friends that you can kick their bacterial butt... with grenades and rocket launchers.

How do I play?

Each game you must destroy the other players by shooting them.

There are different weapons to pick up as well as a shield upgrade to protect yourself from one hit.

Each game consts of rounds and the last survivor wins the round. The first bazillus to win five rounds wins the game. THE BAZILLUS MAXIMUS!

Controls

The game works with keyboard, xbox controller, and playstation dualshock controllers. Be aware that you will need a controller for each additional player. Only one player can play on the keyboard, the others need different controllers.

Online Play: Normally Bazillus Maximus requires every player to be on the same machine. If you want to play online with friends we recommend Parsec: https://parsecgaming.com/
